title: Print, "Sword Dance (Tsurugi no Mai), No. 39", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Sword Dance
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 39 / Tsurugi no Mai
description: A large iris in deep magenta-purple.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Sword Dance (Tsurugi no Mai), No. 39", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.9 cm (16 1/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-92.
